short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Text can be converted into voice audio, and can be downloaded as audio. It supports configuration voice speed, pitch, volume, etc

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A convenient text to speech tool

1. Supports over 50 voices

2. Support multiple roles such as men, women, young people, elderly people, children, etc

3. Support downloading voice to audio files

4. Support configuration of sound speed, tone, volume, etc

5. Support automatic online storage of your text to speech project until you uninstall it

6. Support adding images, merging audio and exporting to video format
